title: Growing Up A Stafford: Kat Meets Billy
description: When Kat Stafford loses her father and mother walks out on her and her brothers, she finds herself in trouble with the law. Luckily, her oldest brother Steve, comes home to take care of them. But when she starts High School and the richest and cutest boy is interested in dating her Kat's brothers and their friends don't make it easy. (YA version and Book 1 of the abridged book The Garden City Rules)
author: Michelle Courtney
